item.title: Hello World
item.description:
I’ve been wanting to bring my website back for a while now, having been less active on social media these years. In an era of brain rot, the time has come we return to the personal website & blog.

The annual bill for my webhosting was substantial, leading me to cancel it at some point. My previous websites were usually made with Wordpress, which provides a nice back-end for managing content. However, the requirement for PHP, a MySQL database, and ideally frequent updates to keep everything secure always felt too bloated for me.

item.title: Read Me
item.description:
Hello! I’m Merlijn, a game developer & programmer from Belgium that plays a lot of video games.

Professionally, I divide my time between the 3 companies I founded. Mithra Games, my one-man indie game studio. Pandafish, a web development studio, and MyB’eats, an app and loyalty platform.

I’ve been tinkering with games since elementary school, building levels for Doom, Duke Nukem 3D, Quake and Half-Life. Later as a technical artist in the games industry. All in all I’ve worked on games for web, mobile, desktop and VR. These days I’m just doing my own thing with Godot.
